svcsubproc.title: Steering Wheel and Column
svcsubproc.para: When installing the steering wheel, attention should be given to index it properly on the shaft. Align the timing mark dots on the shaft with the narrowest (center) spoke, labeled "TOP," of the steering wheel ( Figure 26). This spoke, also referred to as the leading spoke, should be pointing forward.

svcsubproc.title: Pitman Arm Location
svcsubproc.para: The splined Pitman Arm must be aligned with the timing mark on the steering gear output shaft ( Figure 26).
